did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections and Archives, Tompkins-McCaw Library, Virginia Commonwealth University

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Arya Stark papers, M 595, Special Collections and Archives, Tompkins-McCaw Library, Virginia Commonwealth University, Richmond, VA

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gift of Sansa Stark of Winterfell, Westeros.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Duplicate materials were removed from the collection during processing.

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: Born in 1889 at Winterfell, Arya is the youngest daughter and third child of Lord Eddard Stark, the head of House Stark and Warden of the North, and Lady Catelyn Tully. Arya has an older sister, Sansa, an older brother, Robb, and two younger brothers, Bran and Rickon. She also has an older half-brother, Jon Snow.
Stark adopted an orphaned direwolf pup which she named Nymeria and shared a special relationship with her. Stark owned a sword called "Needle." It was given to her by Jon Snow.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection includes letters, journals, manuals, training materials and ephemera. Arya Stark traveled widely and kept journals documenting her travels. She studied at the House of Black and White in Bravos and trained as a Faceless Man. The collection includes her training manuals and videos which provide great insight into an organization of which little is known.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is divided into three series:
Series 1, Personal Papers: these include her correspondence and journals.
Series 2, House of Black and White: contains materials related to her training as a Faceless Man.
Series 3, Ephemera and artifacts: contains her sword Needle, Nymeria's first collar, and assorted coins and trinkets from her travels.
Efforts have been made to maintain the original file organization when possible.

phystech.head: Technical Requirements
phystech.p: A VHS player is necessary for viewing the training video in Series 2

scopecontent.p: Events and people of note mention include Stark's confrontation with Prince Joffrey Baratheon and Nymeria being forced to leave her, Stark's travels with Sandor Clegane (The Hound), and her first meeting with Jaqen H'gar.
